sentences.sentence: We are so anthropomorphic we can't see the world through their eyes.
sentences.translation: 我们过于从人的角度来看问题，我们无法透过猫的眼睛来看这个世界。

sentences.sentence: This is not on the past, the country heard of anthropomorphic cartoon!
sentences.translation: 这是关于把从前未听说过的国家拟人化的漫画！

sentences.sentence: Instead of attributing its creation to anthropomorphic gods, they sought rational explanations.
sentences.translation: 他们不是把世界归因为拟人化的神的创造，而是要寻求一个合理的解释。
